title.rendered: Majestic 4 Bedroom Duplex Apartment on Au Co

content.rendered:
Introducing the Majestic 4 Bedroom Duplex Apartment situated on Au Co Street (Quang An Side), spanning across the prestigious 4th and 5th floors.

This remarkable duplex apartment exudes grandeur and elegance, offering residents a luxurious living experience across two levels. With four spacious bedrooms, residents can indulge in abundant space and comfort, perfect for both relaxation and entertainment.

Nestled on Au Co Street, residents enjoy easy access to a myriad of amenities, including upscale dining establishments, boutique shops, and recreational facilities. Whether you’re hosting guests in the expansive living area or enjoying the stunning views from the upper floor, this majestic duplex apartment offers an unparalleled level of sophistication and refinement in the heart of Hanoi.
